entry.title: Friday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm except locally 5 cm in snow squalls. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls ending overnight then cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 cm except locally 5 cm in snow squalls. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023
